items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Belkin’s new Stage Powergrip 9,300mAh wireless charging camera grip in Gray finish down to $60 shipped. This particular camera grip accessory hit the scene towards the end of last year carrying an $80 price tag. It saw its first deal last month when it dropped to $68, but today’s 25% discount shaves an additional $8 off to mark a new best price to beat. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model to date, so you might want to jump in there and snag one before this timed Lightning deal runs out. You can also get this grip in Blue and Sand finishes, although they’re both fetching their full prices right now at $80. Head below for more details.
